professionalSummary.title: Professional Summary
professionalSummary.content: As a motivated Full Stack Developer, Iâ€™m eager to apply my experience in app development and web projects. I'm seeking opportunities where I can manage web development from start to finish while growing professionally. My skills include building websites, setting up servers, and providing high-quality technical support. I'm committed to delivering excellent web solutions and staying updated with industry trends.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
items: Worked with AWS S3, Lambda, JavaScript, Spring Boot, ZUL, Java APIs, and ReactJS to build a Membership Portal Application.

Connected payment gateways like ECPay, QCRB, and Dragonpay to MySQL databases, handling tasks like sending money, adding funds, E-Load, QRPH, and Instapay. Made sure transactions were secure and smooth by adding encryption and token-based authentication. Key tasks included:
- Security: Used token authentication, encrypted sensitive data, and validated API requests.
- Database: Designed MySQL tables to track payments, logs, and user balances.
- Reliability: Added error handling and retry features to keep things running during failures.
- Monitoring: Set up logging and alerts to catch and fix any payment issues quickly.
Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams and mentored junior developers to support their growth and ensure project success.
Set up local server tunneling to speed up development and testing.

experience.title: Web Developer
items: Developed and improved e-commerce websites using WordPress and WooCommerce, focusing on creating smooth and engaging user experiences.
Optimized site performance, implemented user-friendly features, and integrated secure payment gateways to ensure seamless transactions.
Designed and launched targeted landing pages to increase lead generation and improve conversion rates.
Worked closely with clients, designers, and marketing teams to understand requirements and deliver solutions that meet business goals.
Communicated project progress and collaborated effectively with team members to ensure timely delivery and high-quality results.

experience.title: Hosting Support
items: Managed web servers and provided expert technical support, specializing in diagnosing and resolving WordPress-related issues.
Handled web hosting environments, server configurations, and domain management to ensure stable and secure website operations.
Communicated effectively with clients and internal teams to troubleshoot problems quickly and provide timely solutions.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to maintain system uptime and optimize server performance.
